Room.Name: Blue Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Blue Room of Madame Ruthie's House of Pleasure.
Room.LongDescription: A huge feather bed takes up most of the room, and soft light comes from a candle-lit hurricane lamp at the side of the bed. The great bed is in total disarray, with pillows on the floor and covers in a heap. Leather shackles are mounted on the headboard, and a smoky mirror is overhead on the ceiling.
